data.name: Date Ariane Remastered
data.detailed_description:
Date Ariane Remastered is a complete remake of the popular Date Ariane with all new wide screen HD graphics, and for the first time ever to play as a male or a female!

Date Ariane itself was a Renpy port of the genre defining Ariane's Dating Simulator released online in HTML in 2004, and inspired hundreds of other HTML based dating sims with 3D rendered graphics.

You may play this game and think "This feels a lot like dating sim X", but chances are dating sim X is inspired by this game.

So many changes and improvements have been made to Date Ariane Remastered that I consider this a new game.
data.about_the_game:
Date Ariane Remastered is a complete remake of the popular Date Ariane with all new wide screen HD graphics, and for the first time ever to play as a male or a female!

Date Ariane itself was a Renpy port of the genre defining Ariane's Dating Simulator released online in HTML in 2004, and inspired hundreds of other HTML based dating sims with 3D rendered graphics.

You may play this game and think "This feels a lot like dating sim X", but chances are dating sim X is inspired by this game.

So many changes and improvements have been made to Date Ariane Remastered that I consider this a new game.
data.short_description: The original western dating sim updated and bigger than ever before. The first dating sim made with 3D rendered graphics became a viral web classic back in 2007. This new "remastered" version allows players to play as a male or female for the first time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c 1280x720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Graphics: 1920x1080p

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 1280x720p
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 1280x720p
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: ©2022 Ariane Barnes and Date Ariane Games, All Rights Reserved

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains full male and female nudity rendered in 3D and was not made with actual people.  It does contain adult situations including sex both oral and vaginal between male to female and female to female.  It does not contain fetishism, or animated penetration.  It pretty much sticks to the "soft-core" side of porn.
